name: Rataflan
description:
School project of a toy (game with no win or lose condition )
You're a pudding with the unique ability to posses/absorb other toys in a child's room. 
Feel free to controls all the toys at your disposal in this room : toy car, wooden cubes... all have unique actions ;)

------Controls------

- zqsd : move
- + et - : camera angle
- Espace : action
- Right click : absorb a close toy
- Left Click : leave toy currently absorbed
